snippet.title: Asurya's Embers Trailer
snippet.description:
Immerse yourself in the stunning environment of the Himalayan regions as Dawa, the bow-wielding village protector. Asurya's Embers is a first-person, single-player, bow-and-arrow adventure game where you embark on a journey to save your home from the wrath of a vengeful god. 

This student-made game was created in Fall 2023 by students in Cohort 32, as part of SMU Guildhall's Team Game Production curriculum.

In Asurya's Embers, explore the gorgeous Himalayan landscape and mountains, navigating your way while avoiding the intense sunlight and seeking safety in the shadows. Wield the Protector's Bow and unleash mythical powers passed down through generations to protect your people by slaying mutated, demonic animals.

A long time ago, this beautiful region was plagued by warfare. In order to protect the people from danger, the village initiated a tradition of electing a village protector. In the game, the player assumes the role of Dawa, the newly appointed protector. The story begins following Dawa's completion of her meditation training in isolation. As Dawa embarks on her first day in the role, she learns that the natural balance of her world has been upturned by scorching skies and the arrival of mutated animals. Upon consulting with the village elders, she realizes that there is a more significant problem at hand...

Features
Immersive and Gorgeous Himalayan landscape: Embark on a journey in the Himalayan region, featuring beautiful mountain ranges and realistic architecture inspired by South Asian culture. Enjoy the grace and serenity of the in-game landscape.
Powerful Bow Play: Wield the power of the Protector's Bow, passed down through generations, equipped with multiple special abilities to aid you in your journey of defeating demonic enemies.
Unconventional Light and Shadow Mechanic: Experience our unconventional light and shadow mechanic, where you must seek safety in the shadows and risk damage in the sunlight.
